tosdr.case: The service may sell your data unless you opt out

title: The service may sell your data unless you opt out
quoteText:
we have “sold” the following categories of your Data, depending on how the CCPA is interpreted: identifiers, personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute, commercial information, internet or other similar network activity, and geolocation data.

Minors: We may share or “sell” your personal information as described in Minors of our Privacy Policy.

Your Rights and Choices : You have the right to (1) request more information about the categories and specific pieces of Data we have collected, sold and disclosed for a business purpose in the last 12 months, (2) deletion of your Data, and (3) opt out of the sale of your Data, if applicable,
